Title: Add messaging and in-app notifications

Description:
Implement a notifications system and in-app messaging (chat) between users and providers. Notifications should appear in the header and be persisted.

Acceptance criteria:
- Backend: endpoints to create/list notifications and messages; simple WebSocket or polling support for real-time updates (MVP can use polling).
- Frontend: notification center and basic chat UI.

Labels: enhancement, backend, frontend, realtime
Estimate: L
